title: Germany CPI Transportation
description: The transportation sub-index of the CPI basket in Germany increased to 131.10 points in October of 2022 from 130.90 points in September of 2022. CPI Transportation in Germany averaged 86.59 points from 1991 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 131.10 points in October of 2022 and a record low of 54.30 points in February of 1991. In Germany, Transport accounts for 13 percent of the consumer price index. This page provides - Germany Cpi Transportation- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Federal Statistical Office
